attributes.action: The Government should invest in Reaction engines Skylon
attributes.additional_details:
Although only a small firm, Reaction Engines Ltd should be given more publicity and public investment into a world beating vehicle. With the potential to dominate space transportation (satellites and human), the UK could make billions from such contracts from governments and private firms.
The company should remain private, but with limits on foreign ownership.
Such an opportunity should not be missed, for the sake of the economy and of course national pride.
